description:
In the wake of Sabo`s death, Luffy and Ace grow stronger than ever by continuing their daily routine of nonstop fighting. As the years pass, each brother prepares to set sail in search of future adventures!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: To Live Up to the Promise! Departures of Their Own!
Une promesse à tenir. Départs séparés !
Yakusoku o Hatasu Tame: Sorezore no Tabidachi!
Сдержать обещание! Каждый отправляется в своё путешествие!
約束を果たすため それぞれの旅立ち!
